about_the_game:
Leafblade is a cozy monster tamer mixed with action RPG and farming sim.

You are Rain, a human chosen to carry the Leaf that can create bonds with wild Mons and prevent their extinction. Fight against wild Mons to uncover the mystery behind their aggressiveness, bond with them, take them on adventures and foster them in your Farm Sanctuary with their farm skills to gather food and cook delicious meals to improve their abilities.



Mons can be deadly as enemies but once a bond has been created with them, they will be the best companions in combat with their passive and active abilities or help you grow crops with their Farm skills.




Discover the mystery behind the lost bond between Mons and humans by looking for and talking with the four ancient Mons that rule over monsters.




Some Mons will require just a drop of Dew from your Leafblade, while others will have much complicated requirements like food, objects or even bonds with other Mons.




Your Farm Sanctuary is the best place to rest between adventures, grow crops with your Mons, decorate, cook food for Mons or humans and improve your Leafblade skills before a big challenge.




Cook dishes to increase the stats of your Mons, feed them the right dishes to awake new combat abilities and decorate your farm to ensure they are happy in it!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: (64 bit) 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX11 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
